wikipedia_page.main: Bruce Durie OMLJ FCollT FIGRS FHEA QG is a Scottish genealogist, broadcaster and author. Born in 1954, he started and ran (until Sept 2011) the Professional Postgraduate Programme in Genealogical Studies at the University of Strathclyde, Glasgow, Scotland.

response: * Bruce Durie (born 1954), Scottish genealogist, broadcaster and author
